Body:
""" Test from pandas_df correctly slices the data """
ndarr = np.array([[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 1], [6, 5, 4, 3, 8, 1, 2], [1, 1, 9, 1,
    1, 1, 3], [9, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 4], [3, 3, 3, 9, 3, 3, 5], [1, 2, 2, 9, 1,
    4, 6]])
exp_driver_score = np.array([0.14721, 0.44398, 0.23979, 0.62493, 0.71898, 
    0.31662])
df = pd.DataFrame(ndarr)
driver_score = np.round(Kruskals.Kruskals.from_pandas_df(df, list(range(6)),
    6).driver_score(), decimals=5)
assert np.array_equal(driver_score, exp_driver_score)
